name: Rewind (itch) (Arthur Othy-Gares)
description:
A Global Game Jam's Project with the theme : Roots. We treated "roots" as a reference to the origin.

Pitch

Rewind the past of your dead friend to find where is or more was hiding your enemy. Go back to the previous Level to find him and may be a way to save your friend.

The game will be updated soon.

Team :

- Hugo Picolo

- Lucas Levy

- Arthur Othy-Gares (me)

Made on Unreal Engine 4
